patthana8.66:1.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.66:2.1_0: Nanaupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.66:3.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.66:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
